title: Start
body:
<<activateSpeechBubble Brynn>>Roll initiative!
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>>Yes, I love combat!
<<rollD20 Lance>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>>Yes, I love combat!
<<rollD20 Ruby>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>>Yes, I love combat!
<<rollD20 Franklin>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>>Yes, I love combat!
<<rollD20 Allison>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Lance>><<overridePose Lance happy>>No, really, I love combat!
<<rollD20 Lance>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Ruby>><<overridePose Ruby happy>>No, really, I love combat!
<<rollD20 Ruby>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Franklin>><<overridePose Franklin happy>>No, really, I love combat!
<<rollD20 Franklin>>
<<activateSpeechBubble Allison>><<overridePose Allison happy>>No, really, I love combat!
<<rollD20 Allison>>
